GaleDouble2.synopsis: AD that triggers when you speak to another Avatar's Companion or talk to an unrecruited companion that's been perma bonded to another avatar. The companion won't talk to you and might mention that they've already signed up with someone else. Can be one line or multiple lines if you want to add some variety.

NonBondedCompanionDialog.synopsis: AD that triggers when you speak to another Avatar's Companion or talk to an unrecruited companion that's been perma bonded to another avatar. The companion won't talk to you and might mention that they've already signed up with someone else. Can be one line or multiple lines if you want to add some variety.

NonBondedCompanionDialog_0.speaker: Player
NonBondedCompanionDialog_0.text: You seem nice and all, but I've teamed up with someone else.

CompanionCantTalk_0.speaker: Player
CompanionCantTalk_0.text: I'm a bit busy at the moment. We'll talk later.

CompanionCantTalk_1.speaker: Player
CompanionCantTalk_1.text: I'm a bit busy at the moment. We'll talk later.

CompanionCantTalk_2.speaker: Player
CompanionCantTalk_2.text: Let's get out of here before we stop to chat.

CompanionCantTalk_3.speaker: Player
CompanionCantTalk_3.text: I'm a bit busy at the moment. We'll talk later.
